title: Privacy Policy
content: This Privacy Policy explains that ROVAND LTD ('we', 'us', 'our') does NOT collect, store, process, or share any personal information through any of our applications or services. By using our Services, you acknowledge this policy.
1. Information We Collect

We do not collect any personal information of any kind. Our applications do not request, track, store, or process user data, device data, analytics data, or any other form of identifiable or non-identifiable data.
2. How We Use Your Information
Since we do not collect any information, we do not use, process, analyze, or store any data for any purpose.
3. Legal Bases for Processing
Because no data is collected or processed, no legal basis for data processing is required or applied.
4. When We Share Your Information
We do not share any information with third parties because we do not collect or store any data to begin with.
5. Data Retention
We do not retain any data. Since no information is collected, nothing is stored or kept for any duration.
6. Data Security
As no personal data is collected or stored, there is no data requiring protection. Our applications are designed to operate fully without accessing or handling any user data.
7. Children's Privacy
We do not knowingly collect any data from children or any users. If any data were to be unintentionally submitted, it would not be stored or processed.
8. Your Privacy Rights
Because we do not collect any personal data, there are no rights to exercise regarding access, deletion, correction, or portability of information. No data exists in our systems.
9. Do-Not-Track Signals
Our applications do not track users under any circumstances and therefore do not respond to Do-Not-Track signals, as no tracking occurs.
10. Additional Rights for US Residents
Since we do not collect or handle any data, there is no information to access, delete, correct, or restrict. All users have full privacy by default.
11. Changes to This Policy
This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. The latest version will always be available within our Services.
12. Contact Us
If you have questions, you may contact us at: contact@rovand.limited or visit www.rovand.limited/contact. Address: 71-75 Shelton Street, Covent Garden, London, WC2H 9JQ, England.

title: Cookie Policy
content: Our website does not use cookies, tracking pixels, analytics tools or any other technologies that store information on a user's device.
No session identifiers, advertising cookies, behavioural tracking or third-party marketing tools are used.
If cookie-based features are introduced in the future, users will be informed clearly and consent will be obtained in accordance with UK GDPR and PECR requirements.

Users must not misuse our website or services, including attempting unauthorised access, interference with systems, or any form of malicious activity.

title: Refund & Return Policy
content: For digital products such as software, applications or downloadable content, refunds are issued only if the product is proven to be defective and cannot be restored or delivered as described.
For physical products sold via e-commerce, customers may request a return within the legally required timeframe, provided the product is unused, unopened and in its original condition.
Custom software development, IT consultancy and similar bespoke services are not eligible for refunds once the project has commenced, unless otherwise stated in a separate service agreement.
All refund requests must be submitted with proof of purchase and details of the issue.
